DOC.brief_title: Does Ascorbic Acid Reduce Sympathoexcitation CHF ?
DOC.criteria: Heart failure least New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) class II Left ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) < = 40 % Age 2080 year Necessity shortterm PCI , CABG heart transplantation , Chronic disease autonomic nervous system , diabetes mellitus , use tricyclic antidepressant drug and/or aadrenergic receptor antagonist .
